mese wishayan thora ganna sisuwa wishwa widyala adhyapanayedi atharaman wana thaththwayak thula meyada palasthara wisandum ganayatama ayath wiya.me siyalla awabodhayata ha wishleshanayata lak karamin shri lankiya karmika adhyapanaya thula sidukala suwisheshi aayojanaya lesa shri lanka wruththiya puhunu adhikariye aarambhaya hadunwa diya hakiya.lowa sanwardhitha ratawal ee thana langa karagath aakaraya pilibandawa karana lada wimarshanayakin pasuwa pihituwana lada shri lanka wruththiya puhunu adhikariya saba lesama rate tharunyaya wenuwen sidu karana lada dawanthama aayojanaya lesa hadinwimada yukthi yukthaya.shri lanka wruththiya puhunu adhikariya aarambha wanne 1995 agosthu 16 wana dinaya. 1994 podujana eksath peramunu rajaye kamkaru ha wruththiya puhunu amathyawaraya lesa wathman janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha ema rajaye palamu parlimenthu panatha lesa shri lanka wruththiya puhunu adhikariya panatha sammatha karagaththeya.nagarayata pamanak kendra gathawa thibu karmika adhyapanaya gamata gena yame adhikariye ilakkaya wasara kihipayak gathaweddima sampurna kara ganimata haki wimama dawantha jayagrahanayaki.
